title: Record Driver CPC training you provide

details.description: Record the details of candidates who have completed a Driver Certificate of Professional Competence (CPC) periodic training course
details.alternative_title: Record Driver Certificate of Professional Competence (CPC) you provide
details.more_information:
You’ll need your:

- user ID
- password

$D [Download ‘A guide to recording periodic training for approved training centres’ (PDF, 1.3MB)](http://assets.dft.gov.uk/dsa-bl/dsa_approved_training_centres_guide.pdf "Download ‘A guide to recording periodic training for approved training centres’ (PDF, 1.3MB)"){:rel="external"} $D

##Giving another person access

You can register another person to use the Driver CPC training database if you need them to enter training records. They won't need to register with the Government Gateway.

##Paying to record training

You have to pay to record training details. The fee is £1.25 per driver, per hour of training. 

You can pay in 2 ways:

- by debit or credit card
- by debit from a pre-funded account

A pre-funded account lets you deposit funds with the Driving Standards Agency (DSA) in advance and pay the fee by debiting the amount directly from your account.

###Apply for a pre-funded account

To apply for a pre-funded account, download the terms and conditions and application form, sign the documents and send them to DSA. 

$D [Download ‘Use of pre-funded accounts for DSA services - terms and conditions’ (PDF, 35KB)](http://assets.dft.gov.uk/dsa-bl/dsa_prefunded_accounts_terms_conditions.pdf "Download ‘Use of pre-funded accounts for DSA services - terms and conditions’ (PDF, 35KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

$D [Download 'Pre-funded account application form' (PDF, 90KB)](http://assets.dft.gov.uk/dsa-bl/dsa-prefunded-account-application-form-cpc-delegated.pdf "Download 'Pre-funded account application form' (PDF, 90KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

$A

Driving Standards Agency
PO Box 280
Newcastle-upon-Tyne
NE99 1FP

$A

###Help with your pre-funded account

You can download the user guide to using a pre-funded account.

$D [Download ‘Pre-funded accounts user guide’ (PDF, 407KB)](http://assets.dft.gov.uk/dsa-bl/dsa_prefunded_accounts_user_guide.pdf "Download ‘Pre-funded accounts user guide’ (PDF, 407KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

You can also contact DSA if you need help.

$C

**DSA helpline**

<pfa@dsa.gsi.gov.uk>  
Telephone: 0300 200 1122  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm

$C

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency
